verbs.description: ansonia close to [V: allowing] [ARG1: pot production and dispensary facilities] the city has moved a closer to allowing marijuana production and dispensary facilities in ansonia the final step could come oct 29 when the planning and zoning commission is expected to approve regulations that will govern such operations ultimately they will be done by a special permit said jarod heon the planning and zoning commission chairman on monday night the commission conducted a hearing on proposed marijuana regulations only joshua shuart a 6th ward aldermen showed up i 'm shocked no people attended said heon if anyone was concerned they would have showed up heon said the no - shows further his belief that marijuana is more accepted in today society producer south windsor milford marijuana branford sacred heart university connecticut department of consumer protection portland zoning commission simsbury fountain lake state representative curaleaf joseph jaumann joshua shuart uncasville west haven ansonia rescue and medical services dave elder chairman maureen mccormack bethel dispensary advanced grow labs waterbury sheila o’malley connecticut bishop williams court hartford connecticut pharmaceutical solutions department of consumer protection maureen mccormick jarod heon watertown bristol stop and shop
